**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas City Council Public Safety Committee is convening a special called meeting on October 29, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Briefing Room, 6ES, City Hall. The purpose of this meeting is to discuss various public safety initiatives and updates related to police and fire services.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the September 9, 2024 meeting.
2. Briefings on police and fire recruiting and retention strategies.
3. Updates on the Violent Crime Reduction Plan and Domestic Violence Awareness initiatives.
4. Overview of the Criminal Trespass Affidavit (CTA) Program.
5. Discussion on Civil Service Board Rules and Regulations.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include updates on the Dallas Fire-Rescue Hydrant Maintenance Program, a Blood Transfusion Pilot Program, and facility construction updates. The meeting will also cover the activity report from the Marshalâ€™s Homeless Action Response Team and public safety dashboards.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and will review the various updates and proposals presented. No formal decisions are indicated, but the committee will discuss and provide recommendations on the outlined topics. A closed executive session may occur if legal or personnel matters arise during discussions.
